Identification.ShortTitle: National Energy Board Order No. MO-62-69
Identification.LongTitle: Order Respecting the Application of Part IV of the National Energy Board Act

Section.Text: This Order may be cited as the National Energy Board Order No. MO-62-69.

Heading.TitleText: Application of part IV of the act

Section.Text: The National Energy Board, pursuant to subsection 97(1)1 of the National Energy Board Act, hereby orders that Part IV of the said Act applies to every person who was operating a pipeline on November 2, 1959.

Footnote.Text: This subsection is not reproduced in the R.S.C., 1970, see S.C., 1959, c. 46.
